inputs.name: project_category
inputs.label: Project Category
inputs.description: Type of inquiry or project (e.g. Event, Construction, Facility, Disaster Relief, Other) for this lead; used to tailor qualification flow and routing.

inputs.name: ai_intended_use
inputs.label: AI Intended Use
inputs.description: AIâ€‘identified intended purpose for this inquiry

inputs.name: units_needed
inputs.label: Units Needed (Description)
inputs.description: Summary of quantity and type of units required (e.g.: “2-stall restroom trailer and 10 portable toilets”).

inputs.name: expected_attendance
inputs.label: Expected Attendance/Users
inputs.description: Number of people the facilities need to support (for events or project capacity).

inputs.name: ada_required
inputs.label: ADA Accessible Required
inputs.description: Indicates if ADA-compliant (handicap accessible) facilities are needed.

inputs.name: additional_services_needed
inputs.label: Additional Services Needed
inputs.description: Other services or equipment needed beyond core rentals (e.g. tent, fencing, generator, water supply, dumpster).

inputs.name: onsite_facilities
inputs.label: Other Facilities On-site
inputs.description: Whether there are existing facilities at the site.

inputs.name: rental_start_date
inputs.label: Rental Start Date
inputs.description: When the unit(s) will be needed on site.

inputs.name: rental_end_date
inputs.label: Rental End Date
inputs.description: Expected end date or pickup date for the rental.

inputs.name: site_working_hours
inputs.label: Site Working Hours
inputs.description: Working hours or access times at the site.

inputs.name: weekend_service_needed
inputs.label: Weekend Service Needed
inputs.description: Indicates if service is required over the weekend.

inputs.name: cleaning_service_needed
inputs.label: Cleaning/Restocking Needed
inputs.description: Indicates prospect needs cleaning or restocking service.

inputs.name: onsite_contact_name
inputs.label: On-site Contact Name
inputs.description: Alternate on-site contact name for coordination.

inputs.name: onsite_contact_phone
inputs.label: On-site Contact Phone
inputs.description: Phone number for the on-site contact.

inputs.name: site_ground_type
inputs.label: Site Ground Surface Type
inputs.description: Ground/terrain at the drop-off location (e.g. Concrete, Gravel, Grass).

inputs.name: site_obstacles
inputs.label: Site Obstacles/Access Notes
inputs.description: Notes on access limitations or obstacles at the site.

inputs.name: water_source_distance
inputs.label: Distance to Water Source (ft)
inputs.description: Approximate distance from unit location to nearest water source.

inputs.name: power_source_distance
inputs.label: Distance to Power Source (ft)
inputs.description: Approximate distance from unit location to nearest power source.

inputs.name: within_local_service_area
inputs.label: Within Local Service Area
inputs.description: Checked if location is within ~3 hours of a service hub.

inputs.name: partner_referral_consent
inputs.label: Consent to Partner Referral
inputs.description: Indicates if prospect agreed to share info with partner companies.

inputs.name: needs_human_follow_up
inputs.label: Needs Human Follow-Up
inputs.description: Flag for AI to escalate leads needing human clarification.

inputs.name: quote_urgency
inputs.label: Quote Urgency
inputs.description: How quickly the prospect wants a quote or follow-up.

inputs.name: ai_lead_type
inputs.label: AI Lead Type
inputs.description: AI‑determined category of the lead (e.g. Event, Construction, etc.)

inputs.name: ai_classification_reasoning
inputs.label: AI Classification Reasoning
inputs.description: Explanation of the AI’s logic in classifying this lead

inputs.name: ai_classification_confidence
inputs.label: AI Classification Confidence
inputs.description: Confidence score (0–1) for the AI’s classification

inputs.name: ai_routing_suggestion
inputs.label: AI Routing Suggestion
inputs.description: Pipeline or stage the AI recommends routing this lead into

inputs.name: ai_qualification_notes
inputs.label: AI Qualification Notes
inputs.description: Key notes from the AI’s qualification assessment

inputs.name: number_of_stalls
inputs.label: Number of Stalls (from Call/Form)
inputs.description: How many stalls were requested (from call or form)

inputs.name: event_duration_days
inputs.label: Event Duration Days (from Call/Form)
inputs.description: Number of days the prospect needs the units

inputs.name: guest_count_estimate
inputs.label: Guest Count Estimate (from Call/Form)
inputs.description: Estimated attendee count (optional)

inputs.name: ai_estimated_value
inputs.label: AI Estimated Value
inputs.description: AI‑calculated estimate of deal value
